settings.label: Discount Message
settings.info: This message will be shown to customers without orders on their account, prompting them to use a discount code on their first order

settings.label: Forms Background Image
settings.info: Image placed as background for the sign in, sign up and recover password form, will be used only on desktop resolution.

settings.label: Forms Background Color
settings.info: Background color to fill the spaces when the background image can't fill the space or is not populated

settings.label: Account Background Image
settings.info: Image placed as background for the account pages, will be used only on desktop resolution.

settings.label: Account Background Color
settings.info: Background color to fill the spaces when the background image can't fill the space or is not populated

settings.label: Products Per Page
settings.info: Adjust the number of items to be shown per page

settings.label: Options Divider
settings.info: Indicates the character that divides each variant piece, defaults to pipe symbol (|)

settings.label: Options Headers
settings.info: Indicates the labels that will be shown for the customer to select, they must match the number, order and divider of the size variant option text (Example: US M|US W|EU)

settings.label: Default Selection
settings.info: Indicates the option that is going to be used by default when the customer hasn't made any selection

settings.label: Low Inventory Threshold
settings.info: Defines the value where product cards are going to display the message 'Only X Left'
To enable final sale go to variant level metafields and enable the checkbox "Enable final sale" on the variant(s) that will show this message

settings.label: Message
settings.default: This product cannot be returned after purchase

settings.label: Enable Shopify Collection
settings.info: Emergency trigger, enable only when findify has stopped working and we need to quickly roll back to an MVP working layout

settings.label: Products Per Page
settings.info: Adjust the number of items to be shown per page

settings.label: Show findify badges
settings.info: When enable it lets the badges shown by findify cards to be displayed, otherwise they will remain hidden
These will appear as options when someone shares the website.

settings.label: Show Return Link
settings.info: Display a link to start a return on customer order history page

settings.label: Days to Return
settings.info: How many days the customer has to return/exchange items in their order

settings.label: Notify Text
settings.info: Define the verbiage for the body, use [[product]] to render the product tile, updates depending on the customer selected option

settings.label: Success Message
settings.default: Thanks for subscribing, you'll be notified when this product launches!

settings.label: Error Message
settings.default: We got an error when trying to subscribe you, please try again later
settings.info: Generic message to let the user know that there was an error

settings.label: Footer message
settings.info: Can be used to display a disclaimer text regarding subscribing to our list

settings.label: Size drawer notification message
settings.info: Message shown on the size drawer when all the variants are sold out and have the BIS metafield enabled
settings.default: Select your size to get notified when it's back in stock

settings.label: Notify Text
settings.default: Get notified when the [[product]] [[color]] is back in size [[size]]
settings.info: Define the verbiage for the body, use [[product]] to render the product tile, [[color]] for the variant color and [[size]] for the variant size (the latest will get updated depending on the customer selection)

settings.label: Success Message
settings.default: Thanks for subscribing, you'll be notified when the product gets back!

settings.label: Error Message
settings.default: We got an error when trying to subscribe you, please try again later
settings.info: Generic message to let the user know that there was an error

settings.label: Footer Message
settings.info: Can be used to display a disclaimer text regarding subscribing to our list

settings.label: Favicon image
settings.info: Should be at least 180px x 180px

settings.content: Use this to control the threshold line where the sections are animating in, please note that all the sections will use the same settings

settings.label: Negative threshold
settings.info: Enabling this will make the sections to animate when they are higher inside of the viewport area while positive numbers will make them animate off-screen

settings.content: Use this to control the thresholds (2) where the background is change, consider that top threshold is for items scrolling from top, while bottom one is used for items scrolling from the bottom

settings.label: Enable Gift With Purchase
settings.info: Allows the feature to be disabled without clearing the options for future quick updates

settings.label: Gift Product
settings.info: Product that needs to be added to the cart once the user reaches the threshold

settings.label: Gift threshold
settings.info: Order value that needs to be achieved to add the free gift to the cart

settings.label: Gift product messaging
settings.info: Use [threshold] to place the money value of the threshold anywhere on the phrase
